item.title: WATCH: Former ABC News senior correspondent Jim Avila dies at 69
item.description: Jim Avila, former ABC News senior correspondent and “20/20” correspondent, passed away after a long illness. He was 69 years old.

item.title: Hundreds evacuated and dozens hospitalized after an ammonia gas leak in Oklahoma
item.description: Authorities have evacuated hundreds from a city in Oklahoma after a tanker truck spewed anhydrous ammonia gas in a hotel parking lot

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump blames Democrats for 'massive harm' of shutdown
item.description: President Donald Trump late Wednesday night signed a funding bill that will end the longest government shutdown in U.S. history.

item.title: Epstein offered reporter photos of 'donald and girls in bikinis in my kitchen'
item.description: Among the more than 20,000 Epstein documents released by the House Oversight and Government Reform Committee on Wednesday are several email exchanges ...

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
